Answers.Answer: Drive on the far left side of the road
Move off to the left of the road and have a rest
Speed up so that you can get home quickly

Drive on but increase your speed
Stop until the lights no longer flash

Answers.Answer: With the front wheels of your vehicle on the yellow lines

Wait for the cyclist to go past before opening the door
Warn the cyclist by sounding the horn before opening the door

Answers.Answer: Drive on carefully while the lights are still flashing
Stay stopped until the lights stop flashing
Check both ways and then drive on
Wait for 15 seconds and then drive on

Question: What does this sign mean?

Answers.Answer: You may park your vehicle within the next 40 metres of the sign
